009package imagingbook.common.ij.overlay;
010
011import ij.gui.Overlay;
012import ij.gui.Roi;
013
014public abstract class OverlayUtils {
015
016        /**
017         * Returns a new overlay produced by joining two existing
018         * overlays, which remain unchanged. All involved ROIs are cloned.
019         * 
020         * @param olyA the first overlay
021         * @param olyB the second overlay
022         * @return the new overlay
023         */
024        public static Overlay join(Overlay olyA, Overlay olyB) {
025                Overlay oly = olyA.duplicate();
026                for (Roi roi : olyB) {
027                        oly.add((Roi)roi.clone());
028                }
029                return oly;
030        }
031
032}
